decision_conditions: The development permitted shall be completed before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (As Amended). | The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with the drawing titles: 1525/08; 1525/09; 1525/601; 1525/602; 1525/603; and 1525/604.

REASON: For avoidance of doubt and in the interest of proper planning. | All external materials shall be in accordance with the materials described in the Application Form and Approved Plans as listed in Condition 2 of this decision.

REASON: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the existing building and surrounding area in accordance with the Ealing Common Conservation Area Character Appraisal (2009) and policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); 1.1 and 1.2 of the Local Development Framework (Core) Strategy (2012); and 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan( 2013). | The use hereby permitted shall only be used for incidental purposes to the enjoyment of the residential accommodation provided in the main building at no. 10 Hamilton Road and not for any separate and self-contained residential use or for any industrial, commercial or business use.

REASON: To protect the character of the local rear garden setting and living conditions of occupiers of neighbouring properties in accordance with Ealing's SPD 4 - Residential Extensions, as well as, policies 7.4 and 7.6 of the London Plan (2016); and 7A, 7B and 7.4 of the Ealing Development Management DPD (2013).
